author: raghav710

comments.author: markekraus
comments.body: We just need to make sure the documentation is updated to include the new parameter.

comments.author: raghav710
comments.body:
@daxian-dbw Thanks for the note. Will follow that henceforth during code reviews. As an aside, do you think it is good to squash the commits after approval as that would keep the history clean in case there were multiple code comments.
Heartfelt thanks to you and @mklement0 @iSazonov @SteveL-MSFT . The comments were quite helpful!

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @raghav710 We want keep the history while we review. Then we usually Squash and Merge for simple changes. But if the code is very complex, tricky and add big feature we keep all commits.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @mklement0 We merged the PR but we can always bring Out-String and Out-File into line until RTM.

title: Add NoNewLine switch for Out-String cmdlet
